jcr:content.jcr:title: XML Documentation for Adobe Experience Manager
jcr:content.metaDescription: An enterprise class CCMS. Use a single CMS for managing technical & marketing content from creation to delivery. Reduce total cost of ownership by 40%.
jcr:content.pageTitle: XML Documentation for Adobe Experience Manager
jcr:content.tagsKeywords: DITA CMS, DITA CCMS, migration to DITA, easy migration to DITA, convert to DITA, DITA conversion, easy conversion to DITA, XML on AEM, AEM as DITA CMS, DITA component content management system, DITA content management system, DITA on AEM, AEM as DITA CCMS, XML add on for AEM, XML add-on for adobe experience manager, new xml add on for AEM, latest AEM add-on, XML on Adobe Experience Manager, Adobe Experience Manager as DITA CMS, XML documentation add-on for Adobe Experience Manager, Adobe Experience Manager as DITA CCMS, XML add on for Adobe Experience Manager, XML add-on for adobe experience manager, new xml add on for Adobe Experience Manager, latest Adobe Experience Manager add-on, Adobe Experience Manager as DITA Content Management System, Adobe Experience Manager as DITA Component Content Management System, Adobe XML CMS, XML CMS, XML content management system, DITA content management system, adobe xml content management system, xml CMS integration, CMS xml integration, adobe CMS integration, adobe framemaker CMS, how to use XML on AEM, how to use DITA on AEM, CCMS, component content management system

title.title: Deliver rich engaging content, to global audiences, across platforms and mobile devices

text.text:
Adobe Technical Communication Suite (2015 release) is an indispensable toolkit for content developers. Easily author bidirectional XML/DITA content, create training modules and video presentations, collaborate seamlessly with experts and reviewers, and deliver dynamic content experiences across mobile devices, formats, and platforms.
 
Interested in buying < 5 licences ? ›››       Interested in buying ≥ 5 licences ? ›››

text_31f9.text:
See what your company can do with XML Documentation solution?

 
It’s a component content management system for technical documentation, IT and marketing teams to manage structured content from creation to delivery, providing a consistent customer experience across touchpoints.

text_74b6.text: Download Solution Brief ›

column_383.layout: 3;grid-span-1of5 text-end text-end-tablet text-center-phone ;grid-span-3of5 text-start text-start-tablet text-center-phone ;grid-span-1of5 text-start text-start-tablet text-center-phone grid-padded-t2x grid-padded-b4x ;

image_7e36.alt: Delight customers with consistent experiences by bringing marketing and technical content onto the same platform

text_4a24.text:
Delight customers with consistent experiences by bringing marketing and technical content onto the same platform
Effortlessly author, manage and deliver technical content on the same platform as your marketing content. Empower your marketing and technical teams to reuse each other’s assets and inject technical content into existing webpages. Personalize the end-user experience using advanced analytics with Adobe Marketing Cloud integration.

column_fe6e.layout: 3;grid-span-1of5 text-end text-end-tablet text-center-phone ;grid-span-3of5 text-start text-start-tablet text-center-phone ;grid-span-1of5 text-start text-start-tablet text-center-phone grid-padded-t2x grid-padded-b4x ;

text_63a0.text:
Standardize content in DITA with a simple yet powerful web editor for all
Use the content ingestion framework to consolidate existing content, present in various formats, to a single DITA standard. Enable subject matter experts, with no prior XML knowledge, to author in DITA using a simplified web editor. Give DITA experts advanced authoring capabilities like content reuse, inline tags, and more.

column_4eec.layout: 3;grid-span-1of5 text-end text-end-tablet text-center-phone ;grid-span-3of5 text-start text-start-tablet text-center-phone ;grid-span-1of5 text-start text-start-tablet text-center-phone grid-padded-t2x grid-padded-b4x ;

image_25cf.alt: Stay ahead of the competition with market-leading enterprise content management capabilities

text_de24.text:
Stay ahead of the competition with market-leading enterprise content management capabilities
Use best-in-class content management capabilities of Experience Manager. Manage assets from a single repository for easy access. Track publications with powerful version management. Get powerful capabilities like link and dependency management, search and tag management, automated translation workflows and content health reports.

column_a0bf.layout: 3;grid-span-1of5 text-end text-end-tablet text-center-phone ;grid-span-3of5 text-start text-start-tablet text-center-phone ;grid-span-1of5 text-start text-start-tablet text-center-phone grid-padded-t2x grid-padded-b4x ;

image_7ec1.alt: Empower distributed teams to contribute and collaborate faster and smarter

text_21c3.text:
Empower distributed teams to contribute and collaborate faster and smarter
A fast and easy web-based process saves time and effort by allowing multiple authors and reviewers to give inputs and accept/reject changes. Use projects to assign roles and track progress, and automate the delegation of tasks with customizable workflows. Leverage deep integration with Adobe FrameMaker to author faster.

column_aed7.layout: 3;grid-span-1of5 text-end text-end-tablet text-center-phone ;grid-span-3of5 text-start text-start-tablet text-center-phone ;grid-span-1of5 text-start text-start-tablet text-center-phone grid-padded-t2x grid-padded-b4x ;

image_b8a6.alt: Effortlessly design and deliver immersive, omnichannel content experiences

text_cfd0.text:
Effortlessly design and deliver immersive, omnichannel content experiences
Accelerate content velocity by dynamically publishing DITA content directly to Experience Manager. Offer content as a service across channels from a unified source of structured content. Deliver large volumes of content across devices with enterprise-class publishing. Use out-of-the-box APIs to integrate with other publishing solutions.

text_e6f3.text: See how our customers are using the solution.

text_8011.text:
Palo Alto Networks improves content experience, reach and velocity
With XML Documentation solution, leading global cybersecurity firm Palo Alto Networks was able to achieve faster publishing, reach a larger user base and deliver a uniform website experience for all content.

text_5399.text: Read the Story | Watch Adobe Summit Session recording | See their Documentation

text_8dab.text:
Collaborating on delivering Self Service Content
Adobe self-service documentation team improved content quality and saved $500K annually with a new workflow including XML Documentation for Adobe Experience Manager.
